Description.Title: PotentialTranspiration model
Description.Authors: Peter D. Jamieson, Glen S. Francis, Derick R. Wilson, Robert J. Martin
Description.Institution: New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd., New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd., New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd., New Zealand Institute for Crop and Food Research Ltd.
Description.ExtendedDescription: SiriusQuality2 uses availability of water from the soil reservoir as a method to restrict transpiration as soil moisture is depleted
